config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalAgeThreshold configuration is used in the journal method to set the age threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter to the PersistentJournal constructor along with other parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration depends on how often the journal method is called in the system. If the journal method is called frequently, then the _journalAgeThreshold configuration will be triggered frequently as well.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration on the system is that it determines the age threshold for the journal. This means that older entries in the journal may be removed once they exceed the specified age threshold, which can impact the size and performance of the system.
